description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to Healthcare Cybersecurity management of organizational assets.
name: HITRUST CSF - Asset Management

values.description: Assets associated with information and information processing facilities are identified and an inventory of these assets are drawn up and maintained.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.a Inventory of Assets
